settings.html: Introducing the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation - Precision Power for Radiologists Elevate your radiology practice with the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation, a reliable companion tailored to meet the unique demands of radiologists. The HP Z2 G9 mini is more than just a compact workstation; it's a testament to innovation and engineering excellence. By combining exceptional performance with a space-saving design, the Z2 G9 mini empowers radiologists to tackle complex imaging tasks efficiently, regardless of their workspace constraints.

settings.title: Distinct Features
settings.html:
• Unrivaled Processing: Dual Intel Xeon Silver 4216 @ 3.2GHz with 32 cores delivers unmatched multitasking and computational speed.
  • Crystal-clear Graphics: Nvidia Quadro RTX A4000 16GB graphics card ensures ultra-high definition, crisp, and intricate imaging.
  • Robust Memory: 128GB DDR4 ECC RAM Memory guarantees seamless, accurate, and high-speed data operations.
  • Rapid Storage: 1TB HP ZTurbo NVMe SSD ensures quick data storage and retrieval.
  • Cutting-edge OS: Pre-loaded with Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, plus a free upgrade option to Windows 11 Pro 64-bit.
  • Expert Assistance: Gain access to Radiology IT experts with decades of experience, always on standby for top-tier technical guidance.
  • Proven Compatibility: Tested and approved for use with all Barco and Eizo diagnostic displays, primed to manage complex imaging tasks.

Investing in the HP Z8 Workstation from Monitors.com means entering a collaborative partnership. With our experienced Radiology IT team boasting decades of collective knowledge, you're always backed by the industry's elite.

settings.title: Optimized Performance
settings.content: Enhance the precision and efficiency of your radiological analyses with the formidable capabilities of the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation. Powered by advanced 13th and 14th Gen Intel Core processors, this workstation is meticulously designed to deliver exceptional performance tailored to the intricate demands of your radiology profession. From delving into complex imaging studies to conducting in-depth diagnostic interpretations, HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation empowers you with a seamless and efficient experience. With a primary focus on rendering tasks crucial to your daily workflow, this high-performing workstation ensures that your diagnostic processes are executed with the utmost precision and speed. Navigate through medical imaging data effortlessly, trusting the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation to provide the computing power needed to handle the intricate details of radiological analyses. Experience a new level of reliability and performance that significantly contributes to the accuracy and efficiency of your diagnostic endeavors.

settings.title: HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation's Intel Core i-Series Processors Leading the Way
settings.content: The HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation boasts an array of Intel Core i-Series 13th and 14th generation processors, offering up to 16 E-cores and speeds of up to 5.4 GHz. This lineup includes the i5, i7, and i9 models, presenting radiologists with versatile choices to align with their specific requirements. These processors are meticulously engineered to provide both exceptional performance and efficiency, accommodating a wide range of radiological tasks. Whether you seek dependable computing power for routine image analysis or demand high-performance capabilities for intricate medical imaging and diagnostics, the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation's Intel Core i-Series processors ensure that you possess the essential processing capabilities needed for your radiology practice.

settings.title: Unprecedented Power in a Mini Form
settings.content: The HP Z2 G9 mini defies its compact dimensions by housing powerful components, including the latest Intel Core i-Series processors and a choice between NVIDIA T400, T600, T1000, or RTX A2000 graphics. This mini workstation excels in seamlessly managing complex medical imaging tasks, proving that size doesn't limit high-performance capabilities. Designed for professionals in healthcare and other fields where space is at a premium, the HP Z2 G9 mini provides efficient processing of intricate medical data. Its small form factor doesn't compromise on reliability or performance, making it an ideal solution for those who need a compact yet powerful workstation to tackle demanding workloads and ensure a smooth workflow.

settings.title: Swift Network Connectivity
settings.content: The 10Gb Ethernet interface on the HP Z2 G9 mini facilitates efficient communication and rapid transfer of medical imaging data, enhancing collaboration among healthcare professionals. This feature streamlines the exchange of critical information, providing a reliable platform for the analysis and interpretation of high-quality medical imaging data. With the 10Gb Ethernet interface, healthcare teams can trust in the straightforward and effective transmission of data, fostering a cohesive environment for seamless teamwork. The inclusion of this interface ensures that the HP Z2 G9 mini not only excels in performance but also prioritizes the smooth and collaborative workflow essential in healthcare settings.

settings.title: Multi-Display Precision
settings.content: Experience unparalleled visual precision with the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation, designed to support up to 8 displays at 4K resolution. This expansive Multi-Display Support ensures that every intricate detail is vividly presented, making it the perfect choice for radiologists who demand uncompromising clarity in their readings. Elevate your diagnostic capabilities and immerse yourself in a comprehensive visual environment that enhances your ability to analyze and interpret medical images with precision. The HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation is crafted to deliver a seamless and immersive experience, empowering radiologists with the tools they need for accurate and confident diagnoses.

settings.title: Innovative Thermal Management
settings.content: The HP Z2 G9 Mini combines impressive performance with remarkably quiet operation, thanks to its advanced cooling system. This innovative design ensures a distraction-free work environment, allowing you to concentrate on your tasks without the interference of noise. Whether you're working on intricate medical images or handling resource-intensive applications, the workstation's quiet operation enhances your overall experience. Experience the power of cutting-edge technology without the disturbance of loud fans, providing a conducive atmosphere for radiologists and healthcare professionals to perform critical tasks with precision and focus.

settings.title: Innovative Thermal Management
settings.content: The HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation, featuring DDR5 memory, is an optimal solution for healthcare professionals managing demanding workloads. With its high bandwidth, improved reliability, and enhanced multitasking capabilities, the Z2 G9 Mini ensures efficient and effective workflow for healthcare tasks. The DDR5 memory's high speed and lower power consumption contribute to a more responsive and reliable computing experience, meeting the needs of healthcare professionals who prioritize precision and efficiency. This workstation is designed to support critical healthcare applications, enabling professionals to deliver optimal care to patients while ensuring seamless and reliable computing performance.

settings.title: Tool-less Access for Adaptability
settings.content: Transform your diagnostic workspace seamlessly with the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation, offering tool-less sliding access for effortless customization. Tailor this workstation to your precise imaging requirements with convenient access to the interior, allowing for upgrades and modifications without the need for intricate tools. This user-friendly design ensures healthcare professionals can adapt their computing environment efficiently, providing a flexible platform that evolves with evolving imaging needs. The tool-less sliding access feature simplifies the process of customization, allowing for quick and easy adjustments to align with the ever-changing demands of healthcare tasks, enhancing the overall versatility and adaptability of the HP Z2 G9 Mini Workstation in a diagnostic setting.

settings.title: Versatile Placement for Efficient Readings
settings.content: Integrate the Z2 G9 mini seamlessly into your radiology workspace, whether it be within a medical office setting or the comfort of your home. This compact workstation is designed to effortlessly fit into your chosen environment, offering a versatile solution to meet your specific needs. Explore the flexibility of mounting options, allowing you to position it behind your monitor or discreetly under your desk, thereby providing you with a truly personalized and ergonomic diagnostic setup. This adaptability not only optimizes your workspace but also enhances the overall efficiency of your diagnostic processes. Whether you prefer a sleek, clutter-free desk or an integrated setup behind your monitor for easy accessibility, the Z2 G9 mini caters to your preferences, ensuring a seamless and tailored experience for your radiological tasks.

settings.title: Security Tailored for Radiology
settings.content: Rest easy with the HP Wolf Pro Security Edition, providing preconfigured enterprise-level PC protection. Your critical patient data remains secure, meeting the stringent standards required in radiology practices.

settings.title: Space-Saving Efficiency
settings.content:
The HP Z2 G9 mini delivers exceptional performance in a remarkably compact form factor, making it an ideal choice for space-constrained environments and mobile workstations. Weighing just 2.4 kg (5.29lbs), the Z2 G9 mini is incredibly portable, allowing you to take your imaging power wherever it's needed.

1. H 21.8 cm (21.1")

2. D 21.1 cm (8.6")

3. W 6.9 cm (2.7")
